alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 12 at 8:55PM MDT until June 13 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Utah, Arches/Grand Flat. In Colorado, Grand Valley. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 10 AM to 9 PM MDT Monday. For the Heat Advisory, until 9 PM MDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.
